Safety & Realism Boundaries

Placeholder content — keep it ledger-style. Add sketches/images later.

  • Avoid: step-by-step procedures, dosing, manufacturing
  • Accuracy: logistics + policy + decision points

Template — Chapter Notes Packet

Use this template to draft chapter content without procedural steps.

  • Chapter ID, Title, Subtitle
  • Purpose (Story + Film), On-screen deliverables
  • Field Notes bullets (ledger voice)
  • Red Flag escalation triggers
  • Workflow beats (show competence)
  • Conflict beats + Dialogue seeds
  • Sketch panel requirements
  • Supply drawer scavenger notes
  • Continuity + Safety check

Template — Sketch Panel Brief

Art dept brief for labeled diagrams (no gore).

  • Panel goal (3-second readability)
  • Panel type (map / flowchart / checklist / timeline)
  • Required labels (3–10)
  • Ledger texture checklist (grid, smudges, tape, stamp)
  • Must avoid (procedural steps, gore)
  • Export guidance (SVG preferred)

Template — Outbreak Board (DIY Commune)

Set piece spec: respectful tracking + daily clean routine + shared inventory.

  • Board name + steward rotation
  • Check-in list (initials/symbols, privacy line)
  • Today’s clean routine checklist
  • “No Share” corner
  • Laundry flow (Tier A/B/C)
  • Supply shelf inventory (reserve line)
  • Map of care zones (not punishment)
  • Red flag box (ask early)
